price: 79. Pharaon dit alors : « Faites donc venir tout magicien à la vaste connaissance ! »
arabic: وَقَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ ٱئۡتُونِي بِكُلِّ سَٰحِرٍ عَلِيمٖ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waqāla fir'ʿawnu i'tūnī bikulli sāḥirin ʿalīmin
